text: Dughiar kamɨn, dɨpar aghuir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim anɨdim Jerusalemɨn ikegh ivemar mangam, eghtɨ an tam Amangsɨzim Itir Dɨpar Akaremɨn mangɨtɨma, an tam Mediterenianɨn Ongarir Ekiamɨn mangam. Dɨpar kam dughiabar ivemar mamaghɨra ikiam, an amoziba ko, aruebar dughiamɨn ivemar mamaghɨra ikiam. A bar dakeghan kogham.
